mapper.select: SELECT rev_code,rev_start_date,rev_finish_date FROM reservation join user on reservation.id = user.id where user.id = #{id} and rev_code > 'rev000' order by rev_code desc, rev_start_date desc limit #{pageStart},#{perPageNum};
select count(rev_code) from reservation where rev_code > 'rev000'

select d.rev_code ,c.cam_name, d.cri_area_code, d.cri_price, d.cri_max from camping c join (select camping_rev_info.cri_area_code, cam_code, cri_max, cri_price, r.rev_code from camping_rev_info join reservation as r on r.cri_area_code = camping_rev_info.cri_area_code where r.rev_code = #{rev_code}) d on c.cam_code = d.cam_code;
select j.j_num, c.cam_name, j.is_jjim from jjim as j join camping as c on j.cam_code = c.cam_code where j.id = #{id} and j.j_num > 0 order by j.j_num desc limit #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}
select count(j_num) from jjim where j_num > 0;

SELECT r_code,review.id,rev_code,review.f_code,r_w_date,r_content,r_star,r_declaration FROM review join user on review.id = user.id where user.id = #{id} and r_code > 'r000' order by r_code desc, rev_code desc limit #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}
select count(r_code) from review where r_code > 'r000'
mapper.update: update user set nick = #{nick},birth = #{birth},phone = #{phone},email = #{email} where id = #{id}
update user set pw = #{pw} where id = #{id}
